trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from DiscoveryEndpointProvider to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>类使用从 DiscoveryEndpointProvider 派生的类来获取要使用的发现终结点。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the GetDiscoveryEndpoint method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>类上调用 GetDiscoveryEndpoint 方法<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>实例以获取对用户传递<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>以便发现服务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls GetDiscoveryEndpoint method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>每当必须克隆自己，还可以调用 GetDiscoveryEndpoint 方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>
